update ua_department set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, superior_leader = #{superiorLeader,jdbcType=BIGINT}, parent_dept_id = #{parentDeptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tree_code = #{treeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, charge_cust_id = #{chargeCustId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, delegate_cust_id = #{delegateCustId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, department_type = #{departmentType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, gmt_created = #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, locale_code = #{localeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extra_info = #{extra_info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_code = #{parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finance_dept_code = #{financeDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_cname = #{addressCName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_code = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, center_flag = #{centerFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, web_address = #{webAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_phone = #{servicePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, com_flag = #{comFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district_name = #{districtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district_plat_code = #{districtPlatCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, policy_city_code = #{policyCityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, policy_city_code = #{policyAreaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update.foreach: update ua_department set name = #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, superior_leader = #{item.superiorLeader,jdbcType=BIGINT}, parent_dept_id = #{item.parentDeptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tree_code = #{item.treeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, charge_cust_id = #{item.chargeCustId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, delegate_cust_id = #{item.delegateCustId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, department_type = #{item.departmentType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{item.status,jdbcType=CHAR}, gmt_modified = now(), modifier = 'system', is_deleted = #{item.isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, locale_code = #{item.localeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extra_info = #{item.extraInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_code = #{item.parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finance_dept_code = #{item.financeDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{item.level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_cname = #{item.addressCName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_code = #{item.postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_number = #{item.phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, center_flag = #{item.centerFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, web_address = #{item.webAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_phone = #{item.servicePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, com_flag = #{item.comFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district_name = #{item.districtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district_plat_code = #{item.districtPlatCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, policy_city_code = #{item.policyCityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, policy_city_code = #{item.policyAreaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pdf_seal_rule_num = #{item.pdfSealRuleNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select:
select
from ua_department where code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_deleted='N'
mapper.delete: UPDATE ua_department SET is_deleted='Y' where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT ud.id, ud.name, ud.superior_leader, ud.code, ud.parent_business_code, ud.parent_dept_id, ud.tree_code, ud.charge_cust_id, ud.delegate_cust_id, ud.department_type, ud.status, ud.gmt_created, ud.gmt_modified, ud.creator, ud.modifier, ud.is_deleted , ud.business_code, ud.company_id, ud.locale_code, ud.extra_info, ud.parent_code, ud.finance_dept_code, ud.level, ud.address_cname, ud.post_code, ud.phone_number, ud.center_flag, ud.web_address, ud.service_phone, ud.com_flag, ud.district_name, ud.district_plat_code, ud.policy_city_code, ud.policy_area_code FROM ua_department ud join ua_employee_department_relation uedr on ud.id = uedr.department_id and uedr.is_deleted = 'N' join ua_employee ue on ue.id = uedr.employee_id and ue.is_deleted = 'N'
ud.is_deleted = 'N' and ue.ad_account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT * FROM ua_department WHERE is_deleted='N'
AND name LIKE concat('%', #{name} ,'%')
AND code LIKE concat('%', #{code} ,'%')
AND company_Id = #{companyId}
AND business_code LIKE concat('%', #{businessCode} ,'%')

SELECT * FROM ua_department WHERE is_deleted='N'
AND name LIKE concat('%', #{query} ,'%')

select distinct d1.id, d1.name, d1.superior_leader,d1.code,d1.parent_business_code, d1.parent_dept_id, d1.tree_code, d1.charge_cust_id, d1.delegate_cust_id, d1.department_type, d1.status, d1.gmt_created, d1.gmt_modified, d1.creator, d1.modifier, d1.is_deleted ,d1.business_code,d1.company_id,d1.locale_code,d1.extra_info, d1.parent_code,d1.finance_dept_code,d1.level,d1.address_cname,d1.post_code,d1.phone_number,d1.center_flag,d1.web_address,d1.service_phone,d1.com_flag,d1.district_name, d1.district_plat_code,d1.policy_city_code,d1.policy_area_code from ua_department d1 left join ua_department b on d1.code = b.parent_code where d1.is_deleted='N' and b.parent_code=#{parentCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}
SELECT name FROM ua_department WHERE is_deleted='N' AND id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
